subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Morgan Pressel birdied the final hole in the inaugural Kapalua L.P.G.A. Classic in Hawaii for her first victory of the season. The 20-year-old Pressel closed with a three-under-par 69 to edge Suzann Pettersen by a stroke. ¶Marc Turnesa completed a wire-to-wire victory for his first PGA Tour title, closing with a four-under-par 68 to hold off Matt Kuchar by a stroke at the Justin Timberlake Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in Las Vegas. vegas (AP).
